member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.Assembly
member.summary: Utility class, see remarks.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.Assembly.Use
member.summary: Force the dynamical loading of this assembly.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri
member.summary: Represents a data URI object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of SvgDataUri.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.DecodeToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the image data in this data URI object to a file on disk.
member.param: Output file name

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.DecodeToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the image data in this data URI object to a stream.
member.param: Output stream

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.EncodeFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a standard data URI from an image in a disk file.
member.param: Name of a file on disk containing an image file. Supported image formats are PNG, GIF and JPEG. All other image formats will result in an error.
member.returns: A data URI string containing the media type, encoding and image data encoded as base 64.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.EncodeFromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a standard data URI from an image file in a stream.
member.param: Stream containing an image file. Supported image formats are PNG, GIF and JPEG. All other image formats will result in an error.
member.returns: A data URI string containing the media type, encoding and image data encoded as base 64.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the values of a data URI from an href string.
member.param: The href value as a string.
member.returns: Object that contains the parsed values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.CharSetLength
member.summary: The length of the character set value in the href.
member.value: The length of the character set value in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **0** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.CharSetOffset
member.summary: The offset into where the character set value starts in the href.
member.value: The character offset into where the character set value starts in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **-1** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.Extension
member.summary: The common file extension of the image data in the href.
member.value: The common file extension of the image data in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **null** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.Href
member.summary: The href data
member.value: The href data as a raw string.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.ImageFormat
member.summary: The LEADTOOLS image format that corresponds to the image data in the href.
member.value: The LEADTOOLS image format that corresponds to the image data in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, RasterImageFormat.Unknown if Href does not contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.IsBase64
member.summary: Indicates whether the value is encoded as a base 64 string.
member.value: **true** if the value is encoded as a base 64 string; otherwise, **false** if the data is not encoded as a base 64 string or if Href does not contain a valid data URI.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.IsDataUri
member.summary: Indicates whether the href value contains a valid data URI object.
member.value: **true** if Href contains a valid data URI object and the rest of the parameters are valid; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.MediaLength
member.summary: The length of the media type value in the href.
member.value: The length of the media type value in an Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **0** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.MediaOffset
member.summary: The offset into where the media type value starts in the href.
member.value: The character offset into where the media type value starts in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **-1** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.ValueLength
member.summary: The length of the image data value in the href.
member.value: The length of the image data value in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **0** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.ValueOffset
member.summary: The offset into where the image data value starts in the href.
member.value: The character offset into where the image data value starts in Href if it contains a valid data URI; otherwise, **-1** if Href does contain a valid data URI or if the optional value is missing.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument
member.summary: Represents a Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.#ctor(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)
member.summary: This constructor is required by System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
member.param: The data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
The source and destination of a given serialized stream.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.AddElementIDs
member.summary: Adds unique IDs to the elements of this SvgDocument.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.BeginRenderOptimize
member.summary: Optimizes the document for rendering.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Begins a process to update the elements (nodes) of an SVG document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.CalculateBounds(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the physical (pixel) bounds and resolution of this SvgDocument.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this SvgDocument.
member.returns: The SvgDocument object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.EndRenderOptimize
member.summary: Clears the rendering optimization data.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.EndUpdate
member.summary: Ends a process that updates the elements (nodes) of an SVG document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.EnumerateElements(Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateOptions,Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateElementsCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Enumerates the elements (nodes) of this SvgDocument with the specified options.
member.param: Options to use. Can be **null**.
Callback to receive the elements (nodes). Cannot be **null**.
Optional user data that will be passed to the callback.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Flat(Leadtools.Svg.SvgFlatOptions)
member.summary: Flattens this SvgDocument.
member.param: The flat options to use. This can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.GetObjectData(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)
member.summary: Populates a specified System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo with the data needed to serialize this object.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo to populate with data.
The contextual information about the source or destination of the serialization.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.HasElement(Leadtools.Svg.SvgElementType)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this SVG document contains any elements of the specified type.
member.param: Element type to search.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.load
member.summary: Creates an SvgDocument object from a LEAD stream containing SVG data.
member.param: The stream containing SVG data.
Options to use during load. If this parameter is **null**, then the default SvgLoadOptions will be used.
member.returns: The SvgDocument object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.LoadFromFile(System.String,Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions)
member.summary: Creates an SvgDocument object from an SVG file on disk.
member.param: Path to the SVG file on disk
Options to use during load. If this parameter is **null**, then a default SvgLoadOptions object will be used.
member.returns: The SvgDocument object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.LoadFromMemory(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions)
member.summary: Creates an SvgDocument object from data saved in a memory buffer.
member.param: Buffer containing the SVG data.
0-based offset into the \buffer\ where the data begins.
Number of bytes to read.
Options to use during load. If this parameter is **null**, then a default SvgLoadOptions object will be used.
member.returns: The SvgDocument object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.LoadFromStream(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions)
member.summary: Creates an SvgDocument object from a stream containing SVG data.
member.param: The stream containing SVG data
Options to use during load. If this parameter is **null**, then a default SvgLoadOptions object will be used.
member.returns: The SvgDocument object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.MergeWith(Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument,Leadtools.Svg.SvgMergeOptions)
member.summary: Merges the content of this SVG document with the element of a source document. Stores the result in this SVG document.
member.param: The source document. The elements of this document will be merged with the current SVG document. This value cannot be **null**.

Options used during conversion, specifying which elements to drop from the source or destination document during the merge operation. If this value is **null**, then all the elements from the source and destination documents are merged.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.OptimizeView
member.summary: For internal use.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Rasterize(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions)
member.summary: Renders this SvgDocument to the surface of a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object.
member.param: The target image. This must be a valid Leadtools.RasterImage object that is allocated and ready to use. Cannot be **null**.
Options to use during rendering. Can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Render(Leadtools.IRenderingEngine,Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions)
member.summary: Renders this SvgDocument to an output engine.
member.param: Rendering engine to use for the target device. Cannot be **null**.
Options to use during rendering. Can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Resize(System.Double)
member.summary: Resizes this SVG document by the specified factor.
member.param: Factor to use. This value must not be 0.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.save
member.summary: Saves this SvgDocument to a LEAD stream.
member.param: Output stream.
Save option. Can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.SaveToFile(System.String,Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves this SvgDocument to a disk file.
member.param: Output file name.
Save option. Can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.SaveToStream(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves this SvgDocument to a stream.
member.param: Output stream.
Save option. Can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.SetBounds(Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds)
member.summary: Sets the physical (pixel) bounds of this SvgDocument manually
member.param: The bounds to use.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.SetFilterElementsCallback(Leadtools.Svg.SvgFilterElementsCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the optional callback used to exclude svg elements from various operations.
member.param: Callback to filter Svg elements (exclude svg elements).
Optional user data passed to the callback.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.SetFlat(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the flat flag of this document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.SortElements(Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortOptions,Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortElementsCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Enumerates the elements of this SvgDocument in a sorted manner.
member.param: Options to use. Can be **null**.
Callback to receive the sorted elements. Cannot be **null**.
Optional user data that will be passed to the callback.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.ToFlat(Leadtools.Svg.SvgFlatOptions)
member.summary: Gets a flat version of this SvgDocument.
member.param: The flat options to use. This can be **null**.
member.returns: The flat version of this document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this SvgDocument.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this SvgDocument.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Finalize
member.summary: This method overrides System.Object.Finalize

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Bounds
member.summary: Gets the physical (pixel) bounds and resolution of this SvgDocument.
member.value: The physical (pixel) bounds and resolution of this SvgDocument.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Handle
member.summary: Returns the internal SVG document handle. Used internally by LEADTOOLS.
member.value: The internal SVG document handle. Used internally by LEADTOOLS.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.IsFlat
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this SvgDocument is flat.
member.value: **true** if this document is flat; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.IsRenderOptimized
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this document has optimized rendering data.
member.value: **true** if this document has optimized rendering data; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDocument.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG version of the document.
member.value: The SVG version of the document

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgElementInfo
member.summary: Holds the information of an SVG element.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgElementInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgElementInfo.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgElementInfo.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the physical (pixels) bounding rectangle of the SVG element.
member.value: The physical (pixels) bounding rectangle of the SVG element. The default value is an Leadtools.LeadRectD initialized to all 0's.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgElementInfo.ElementType
member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG element type.
member.value: The SVG element type. The default value is SvgElementType.Unknown.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgElementInfo.TextData
member.summary: Gets or sets the text data if this is a text SVG element.
member.value: The text data if this is a text SVG element or **null** otherwise. The default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateOptions
member.summary: Options to use when enumerating SVG elements (nodes).

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgEnumerateOptions with default options.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateOptions.EnumerateDirection
member.summary: Specifies the direction the engine will use when enumerating the elements.
member.value: The direction the engine will use when enumerating the elements. The default value is SvgEnumerateDirection.TopToBottom.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgFlatOptions
member.summary: Options to use when flattening an SVG document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgFlatOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgFlatOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgFlatOptions.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the physical size in pixels to use when flattening an SVG document.
member.value: The physical size in pixels to use when flattening an SVG document. The default value is LeadSizeD.Empty.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgFlatOptions.TextOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to leave only the text elements after the document is flattened.
member.value: **true** to leave only the text elements after the document is flattened; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions
member.summary: Options to use when loading SVG documents.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgLoadOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions.LoadFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the options to use during loading of SVG documents.
member.value: The options to use during loading of SVG documents. The default value is SvgLoadFlags.Default.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgLoadOptions.MaximumElements
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of elements to load when loading an SVG.
member.value: A value that indicates the maximum number of elements to load when loading an SVG. Must be a value greater than or equal to 0. Use 0 to load all elements.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgMergeOptions
member.summary: Options to use with the SvgDocument.MergeWith method.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgMergeOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgMergeOptions class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgMergeOptions.DestinationDropFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates which element types from the destination document to drop (ignore) when merging.
member.value: A value that indicates which element types from the destination document to drop (ignore) when merging. The default value is SvgDropFlags.None, which means no elements are dropped.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgMergeOptions.SourceDropFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates which element types from the source document to drop (ignore) when merging.
member.value: A value that indicates which element types from the source document to drop (ignore) when merging. The default value is SvgDropFlags.None, which means no elements are dropped.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle
member.summary: Represents a node (element) in an SVG document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.GetAttributeValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified attribute of an element as a raw string.
member.param: The attribute name.
member.returns: The value of the specified attribute. **null** if the element does not have an attribute with this name.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.GetElementName
member.summary: Gets the name of the element.
member.returns: The name of the element. This is the XML element name. For example, "svg" for the top level <svg> element in the document, "image" for an <image> element in the document, etc.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.GetElementValue
member.summary: Gets the XML value as a raw string.
member.returns: The XML value as a raw string.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.RemoveElementAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified attribute from the XML element.
member.param: The attribute name to remove. Ignored if the element does not have an attribute with this name.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.SetAttributeValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified attribute from a raw string.
member.param: The attribute name.
The new value of the attribute. A new attribute will be created if the element does not have an attribute with this name.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.SetElementValue(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the XML value from a raw string.
member.param: The new value of the XML element as a raw string.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.Bounds
member.summary: The bounding rectangle of the element.
member.value: The bounding rectangle of the element. This value is in SVG coordinates that matches SvgDocument.Bounds.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgNodeHandle.ElementType
member.summary: The element type
member.value: The element type. For example, ElementType.Svg for the top level \<svg\> element in the document or ElementType.Image for an <image> element in the document, etc.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions
member.summary: Options for rendering an SVG document to a target device.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgRenderOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to fill the background of the transformed destination rectangle.
member.value: The color used to the fill the background of the transformed destination rectangle. The default value is "white".

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the destination rectangle, in pixel coordinates.
member.value: The destination rectangle, in pixel coordinates.The default value is LeadRectD.Empty.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.ClipBounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the clipping rectangle, in pixel coordinates.
member.value: The clipping rectangle, in pixel coordinates. The default value is LeadRectD.Empty.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.RenderFlags
member.summary: Extra render options.
member.value: Extra SVG render options. Default value is SvgRenderFlags.None

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.Transform
member.summary: Gets or sets the transformation to be applied when rendering the document.
member.value: The transformation to be applied when rendering the document. The default value is LeadMatrix.Identity.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgRenderOptions.UseBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use the BackgroundColor color to fill the background of the transformed destination rectangle.
member.value: **true** to use the BackgroundColor color to fill the background of the transformed destination rectangle; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions
member.summary: SVG write options

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgSaveOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the text encoding to use when saving the SVG document.
member.value: The text encoding to use when saving the SVG document. The default value is SvgEncoding.UTF8.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG format to use when saving the SVG document.
member.value: The format to use when saving the SVG document. The default value is SvgFormat.Svg.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions.Formatted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the final SVG document is formatted in a human-readable format.
member.value: **true** the final SVG document is in a human-readable format; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSaveOptions.Indent
member.summary: Gets or sets the string to use for indentation when saving the SVG document.
member.value: The string to use for indentation when saving the SVG document. The default value is two spaces " ".

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortOptions
member.summary: Options to control how to sort the elements in this SVG document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SvgSortOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortOptions.ExtractText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text extraction mode used.
member.value: The text extraction mode used. The default value is SvgExtractText.Character.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortOptions.SortFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the sorting flags used.
member.value: The sorting flags used. The default value is SvgSortFlags.Default.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgTextData
member.summary: Contains the data of a text element.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgTextData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SvgTextData.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgTextData.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the bounding rectangles of each character in the text.
member.value: The bounding rectangles of each character in the text. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgTextData.CharacterFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets position flags for each character in the text.
member.value: The position flags for each character in the text. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgTextData.Directions
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction of each character in the text.
member.value: The direction of each character in the text. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgTextData.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text as a string.
member.value: The text as a string. The default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateElementsCallback
member.summary: Callback to receive the SVG elements (nodes).
member.param: The source SvgDocument.
Node handle.
Optional user data. This is the same parameter passed to EnumerateElements.
member.returns: For an example, refer to SvgDocument.EnumerateElements.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgFilterElementsCallback
member.summary: Callback to allow certain element types to be ignored when sorting.
member.param: The source SvgDocument.
The current element type.
Optional user data passed to the callback.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgSortElementsCallback
member.summary: Callback to receive the sorted SVG elements.
member.param: The source SvgDocument.
Element information.
Optional user data. This is the same parameter passed to SortElements.
member.returns: For an example, refer to SvgDocument.SortElements.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgCharacterDirection
member.summary: Character direction

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgCharacterDirection.LeftToRight
member.summary: Character is left to right

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgCharacterDirection.RightToLeft
member.summary: Character is right to left

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDropFlags.Shapes
member.summary: Drop all shape elements (vector objects).

member.summary: Drop all image elements.

member.summary: Drop all text elements.

member.summary: Internal use only.

member.summary: Internal use only.

member.summary: UTF8 encoding (default)

member.summary: UTF16 encoding

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateDirection
member.summary: The direction to use when enumerating SVG elements (nodes).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateDirection.Top
member.summary: Enumerate only the top-level elements.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateDirection.TopToBottom
member.summary: Enumerate from the top element and all children.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgEnumerateDirection.BottomToTop
member.summary: Enumerate from the lowest children in the document and then upward to the top element.

member.summary: Extract the text one word at a time.

member.summary: Drop all elements that are not images or text during loading.

member.summary: Drop all image elements during loading.

member.summary: Drop all text elements during loading.

member.summary: Default rendering.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds
member.summary: Represents the calculated bounds of an SVG document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the physical bounds, in pixels, of this SVG document.
member.value: The physical bounds, in pixels, of this SVG document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.IsTrimmed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bounds were calculated by cropping the child elements themselves and ignoring the SVG document size.
member.value: **true** if Bounds was calculated by cropping the child elements themselves and ignoring the SVG document size; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.IsValid
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the SVG document contains valid calculated bounds.
member.value: **true** if the SVG document contains valid calculated bounds; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution (Dots per inch) of the SVG document.
member.value: The resolution (Dots per inch) of the SVG document.
